TestDescription.name: Apache 2.x version older than 2.0.49

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]This version of Apache 2.x is vulnerable to a flaw in mod_ssl that can be used to cause denial of service.[break][break][navy]Affected Apache versions (2.0.35 - 2.0.48).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache 2.x to the latest version.
